title: AssertionError: Image Not Found ../coco/images/Train/000000000138.jpg
body:
## ‚ùîQuestion
Even though Image is present in the folder it is still showing image not found 
![Folder_structure](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/71821730/103296851-03037f80-4a1d-11eb-9ef6-5f1c9820eed0.PNG)
.

## Additional context
command used -python train.py --cfg cfg/yolov4.cfg --data data/objcoco.data --weights /content/drive/MyDrive/Colab\ Notebooks/yolov4.weights --epochs 200 --batch-size 32 -sr --s 0.001 --prune 1


O/p
